entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 08:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
